summary: This document is an email correspondence between Amanda Kirby and Harry Beller regarding remaining positions at JPMorgan. Amanda Kirby, an associate at Deutsche Bank, acknowledges receipt of information from Harry Beller. The email is marked as confidential.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is an associate at Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas and is involved in a discussion regarding positions at JPMorgan.

persons.name: Harry Beller
persons.context: Harry Beller is mentioned as the sender of the email to Amanda Kirby, providing information as requested.

keyFacts: Amanda Kirby is an associate at Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas.
The email correspondence is dated January 8, 2014.
The email discusses remaining positions at JPMorgan.
The document is marked as confidential.
